net.openhft.chronicle.hash.replication

Class AbstractReplication.Builder<R extends AbstractReplication,B extends AbstractReplication.Builder<R,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.hash.replication.AbstractReplication.Builder<R,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the concrete AbstractReplication subclass: SingleChronicleHashReplication or ReplicationHub
    B - the concrete builder subclass: SingleChronicleHashReplication.Builder or ReplicationHub.Builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReplicationHub.Builder, SingleChronicleHashReplication.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractReplication

    public abstract static class AbstractReplication.Builder<R extends AbstractReplication,B extends AbstractReplication.Builder<R,B>>
extends Object
    Builder of AbstractReplication configurations. This class and it's subclasses are mutable, configuration methods mutate the builder and return it back for convenient chaining.

public B udpTransport(@Nullable
                     UdpTransportConfig udpConfig)
        Configures UDP transport settings, used by Replications, created by this builder. null means that UDP transport shouldn't being used.
        Parameters:

      • remoteNodeValidator

      • bootstrapOnlyLocalEntries

        @NotNull
public B bootstrapOnlyLocalEntries(boolean bootstrapOnlyLocalEntries)
        Configures if the node, provided with replication, created by this builder, should replicate only local data, last updated with own identifier, or all data currently present on the node, when a new node joins the replication grid.

        Default configuration is false, potentially swamping new nodes with duplicates. However, this does guarantee that all the data is replicated over to the new node and is useful especially in the case that the originating node of some data is not currently running.

        Parameters:
        bootstrapOnlyLocalEntries - if a node provided with this replication should replicate only local data to the new nodes joining the replication network
        Returns:
        this builder back

      • createWithId

        @NotNull
public abstract R createWithId(byte identifier)
        Creates a Replication instance with the given node (server) identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the node (server) identifier of the returned replication
        Returns:
        a new Replication instance with the specified node (server) identifier
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given identifier is non-positive
        IllegalStateException - if neither tcpTransportAndNetwork(TcpTransportAndNetworkConfig) nor udpTransport(UdpTransportConfig) are configured to non-null. At least one of the transport-level configs should be specified.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
